Klasse ServerContext

java.lang.Object
server.ServerContext
public class ServerContext extends Object
Central server context managing game state, user sessions, and room data.

      public void startHeartbeatCleanup()

    • startBotRoomCleanup

      public void startBotRoomCleanup()
      Starts background cleanup of bot-only rooms. Removes rooms containing only bot players.

      Parameter:
